scoringPlays.text: Olamide Zaccheaus 1 Yd pass from Bryce Perkins (A.J. Mejia Kick)
Stevie Scott 40 Yd Run (Logan Justus Kick)
Donavan Hale 9 Yd pass from Peyton Ramsey (Logan Justus PAT blocked)
Nick Westbrook 23 Yd pass from Peyton Ramsey (Logan Justus Kick)
Chris Sharp 20 Yd pass from Bryce Perkins (A.J. Mejia Kick)

videos.headline: Ramsey finds Westbrook to extend Virginia's lead
videos.description: Virginia QB Peyton Ramsey tosses a 23-yard pass to WR Nick Westbrook, who is wide open in the end zone for the touchdown.
